mock.onGet("api/apps/todo").reply(function(request){var filter=request.params.filter;var filteredTasks=data.tasks.filter(function(task){// If filter == all
if(filter==="all")return!task.isTrashed;// If filter == starred
if(filter==="starred")return!task.isTrashed&&task.isStarred;// If filter == important
if(filter==="important")return!task.isTrashed&&task.isImportant;// If filter == completed
if(filter==="completed")return!task.isTrashed&&task.isCompleted;// If filter == trashed
if(filter==="trashed")return task.isTrashed;else return task.tags.includes(filter);}).reverse();return[200,JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(filteredTasks))];});// POST : Add new Tasks
mock.onPost("/api/apps/todo/new-task").reply(function(request){// Get task from post data
var task=JSON.parse(request.data).task;var length=data.tasks.length;var lastIndex=0;if(length){lastIndex=data.tasks[length-1].id;}task.id=lastIndex+1;data.tasks.push(task);return[201,{id:task.id}];});// Trash Todo
mock.onPost("/api/app/todo/trash-todo").reply(function(request){var todoId=request.data;data.tasks=data.tasks.map(function(_todo){if(_todo.id===todoId){_todo.isTrashed=true;}return _todo;});return[200,todoId];});
